Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Syracuse in 1966...
Injured on 9/1/1966 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 5/22/1967 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/30/1970 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 5/24/1971, off Thomas Tuttle (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/26/1978, off Bobby Minarik (PON)...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/11/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $589,400 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Wisconsin on 8/2/1980...
